product_name: Kurgo Stowe Dog Booster Seat - 2014 Closeout
long_description: Give your pet a boost with this sturdy car seat. The modern dura-suede evokes the perfect balance of style and comfort, while the seat creates a safe driving environment for you and your pup.
short_description: Give your pet a boost with this sturdy car seat. The modern dura-suede evokes the perfect balance of style and comfort, while the seat creates a safe driving environment for you and your pup.
